title: Oriental - International Organ Keyboard
description:
45% off for limited time because of new year - hurry up - the real price : 25$

before download you can see this video to be amazed about this app abilities :

this application is the only oriental organ keyboard musical instrument that has all type of Iranian / Arabic / Turkish / Azari / Afghani and international rhythms also with quarter tunes !! for all types and all sizes of iPhone / iPad ,...

if you are not sure , you can see the video to be amazed

the most important features that made this application special are :

- this organ have had over 50.000 downloads only in one country in just 5 months . and now the international version is in your hands

1 - western and oriental organ rhythm styles
2 - 12 majour and minor accords that are used in this type of music 
3 - quarter notes tune ability for each clavier
4 - transpose ability from -20 to +20 percent 
5 - volumes mix ability for accords , rhythms and instruments
6 - 9 different selectable completely real instruments such as organ , qanon , harp , string , vibraphone , piano , ...
7 - up to 16 different pad sounds such as laugh , applause , ... 
8 - 2 selectable octaves
9 - recording ability during the playing
10 - easy using and simple menus for every one even if don't know any thing about musics
11 - flasher for disco light during the playing
12 - rhythm speed change from -20 to 20 percents

if you just have a look on this organ video , then you will be amazed and you will buy this app because i promise you that you can't find any similar application
